# Setup
```{r setup}
library(multiAnalysis)
set.seed(123)
type <- "qual"
set_analysis(block_name = "clinic_still_processed", to_remove = c("1007", "1014"), type = type)
hc_metric <- "spearman"
# blocks <- blocks[[1]]
n_run <- 1000000
MAX_CLUSTERS <- 6
hc_method <- 3
cols <- function(a = 1) {
    c(rgb(77 / 250, 175 / 250, 75 / 250, a), rgb(150 / 250, 80 / 250, 150 / 250, a), rgb(1, 0.5, 0, a), rgb(1, 40 / 250, 45 / 250, a), rgb(0 / 250, 120 / 250, 180 / 250, a), rgb(100 / 250, 50 / 250, 75 / 250, a))
}
# c(rgb(77/250, 175/250, 75/250, a),rgb(77/250, 175/250, 75/250, a),rgb(150/250, 80/250, 150/250, a), rgb(150/250, 80/250, 150/250, a)) #, rgb(1, 40/250, 45/250, a), rgb(1, 0.5, 0, a), rgb(0/250, 120/250, 180/250, a))

col_grp <- function(x = som_clusters, a = 1) {
    x <- as.factor(x)
    levels(x) <- cols(a)
    return(as.vector(x))
}
```

# Data preparation
```{r}
res_scaled_na <- scale0(blocks, "zscore")
res_scaled <- res_scaled_na
res_scaled[is.na(res_scaled)] <- 0
```

```{r}
som_grid <- somgrid(
    xdim = 3,
    ydim = 3,
    toroidal = TRUE,
    topo = "hexagonal"
)
model <- "som_model_qual3"

# save(som_model_qual3, file = file_path)
load(file_path)

# plot(som_model, type = "changes")

som_inds <- som_model$unit.classif %>% set_names(rownames(blocks))
print(sapply(seq(max(som_inds)), function(x) names(som_inds[som_inds == x])))
som_inds %>%
    as.factor() %>%
    fct_infreq() %>%
    fct_count()
```

# Clustering
```{r}
# Data preparation
som_codes <- som_model$codes[[1]]
rownames(som_codes) <- rownames(som_codes) %>% gsub("V", "N", .)

# Clustering for the samples
res_dist <- get_dist(som_codes, stand = FALSE, method = hc_metric)
n <- nrow(som_codes) - 2
if (MAX_CLUSTERS > n) {
    MAX_CLUSTERS <- n
}
classif <- getClassif(hc_method, MAX_CLUSTERS, som_codes, res_dist)
cls <- getClusterPerPart(MAX_CLUSTERS, classif)
cl_summary <- get_summary(res_dist, cls, MAX_CLUSTERS, k = 2)
cl_summary
k <- which.max(cl_summary$`Silhouette index`) + 1
lapply(
    2:MAX_CLUSTERS,
    function(i) plot_silhouette0(res_dist, cls, i)
) %>%
    plot_grid(
        plotlist = .,
        align = "vh",
        labels = paste("k =", 2:MAX_CLUSTERS),
        hjust = 0,
        nrow = 2,
        ncol = 3
    )

# Variable contribution
100 * getCtrVar(k, cls[[k - 1]], som_codes)
ctr <- getDiscriminantVariables(k, cls[[k - 1]], som_codes, ncol(som_codes))
plotHistogram(df = ctr)


# res0 <- pvclust(
#   t(som_codes),
#   method.hclust = hc_method,
#   method.dist = "euclidian",
#   use.cor = "pairwise.complete.obs",
#   nboot = n_boot,
#   parallel = TRUE
# ) %>% suppressWarnings()
# plot_dendrogram(res0, k = k, color = colors_k)
som_clusters <- cls[[k - 1]]

# som_clusters <- read.csv2(file.path(path, "clusters0.temp.tsv"))$cl0
ind_clusters <- som_clusters[som_inds]
ind_clusters %>%
    as.factor() %>%
    fct_infreq() %>%
    fct_count()

# Chi-test
if (type == "qual") {
  chi2(som_clusters, som_codes)
  chi2(ind_clusters, blocks)
}
```

# Heatmap
```{r}
# Clustering for the variables
if (hc_method > 2) {
    col_dist <- t(som_codes) %>%
        get_dist(stand = FALSE, method = hc_metric)
    col_classif <- hclust(col_dist, method = getClassifType(hc_method))
    col_cls <- getClusterPerPart(MAX_CLUSTERS, col_classif)
    col_summary <- get_summary(col_dist, col_cls, MAX_CLUSTERS, k = 2)
    col_summary
    k_col <- which.max(col_summary$`Silhouette index`) + 1
    lapply(
        2:MAX_CLUSTERS,
        function(i) plot_silhouette0(col_dist, col_cls, i)
    ) %>%
        plot_grid(
            plotlist = .,
            align = "vh",
            labels = paste("k =", 2:MAX_CLUSTERS),
            hjust = 0,
            nrow = 2,
            ncol = 3
        )

    pheatmap(
        scale0(som_codes, "minmax"),
        color =  colorRampPalette(colors_ind)(100),
        angle_col = 315,
        na_col = "black",
        border_color = NA,
        # annotation_col = my_sample_col,
        cluster_rows = classif,
        cluster_cols = col_classif,
        cutree_rows = k,
        cutree_cols = k_col
    )
}
```
